## Features
- Responsive design
- Navigation
- About section
- Animations

### Description
Enhance the user interface and experience for all users of the platform.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Platform is responsive and works on all devices
- Navigation is intuitive
- About section is informative and engaging
- Animations are smooth and enhance usability
